items.title: An options strategy that could tap Netflix's value no matter what happens with Warner Bros. deal
items.description: Merger uncertainty is pressuring Netflix stock, which is down almost 29% from its June highs, while options premiums have risen considerably.

items.title: This casino stock is beating the market in 2025. Why Goldman thinks the new year will bring more gains
items.description: The bank upgraded the casino operator to buy from neutral.

items.title: Jefferies sees more outperformance ahead for this cruise stock after year-to-date rally
items.description: The bank upgraded the cruise stock to buy from hold.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on these 3 dividend stocks for enhanced returns
items.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Devon Energy and CVS Health.
